page.title: 14CUSTOMS
page.content:
Mischief Night is on November 4th. It is when children play tricks in the villages.They must be careful not to cause damage or frighten people.
Sometimes gates are removed and hidden.Dustbins can be tipped up or lids tied to doors to make a loud noise when the door is knocked upon and opened.
On November the 5th in Thornton Watlass we have a bonfire.We have a Guy on the top.We bring our own fireworks and set them off ourselves. Adults provide food.We sometimes have jacket potatoes,hot dogs or soup. Sometimes parents make toffee and toffee apples and hand it round to the other people.
